effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.sword_shield: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.sword_shield: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user attacks by draining the target’s nutrients. Some of the damage dealt to the target is absorbed by the user to restore their own HP.
